means: （靠很少的钱或食物）维持生活，生存下去

sentence.Network_en: Old people often subsist on very small incomes.
sentence.Network_cn: 老人往往靠十分微薄的收入艰难度日。

sentence.Network_en: Almost every employee must moonlight in second jobs simply to subsist.
sentence.Network_cn: 只是为了维持生计，几乎每个职员都要偷偷地做兼职。

sentence.Network_en: The living things on the earth could not subsist on Mars.
sentence.Network_cn: 地球上的生物不可能在火星上生存.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 王玉梅托福词汇 Word_list_36_在线英语听力室 ... subsidy 补助金，津贴 subsist 生存，存在，供养 subsistence 生存；生计；存活.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... resist 反抗＋ subsist v 生存，维持生活 subsistence n 生存，生计.
TOEFL词汇表（Part34） - 中华考试网（Examw.Com） ... subsidize v. 补助, 资助 subsist v. 活下去；生存 substantiate v. 证实, 加强.
How do they manage to subsist ?, 他们怎样糊口?

list.abs: 这牵涉到生存危机（subsistence crisis）问题。表现有二：其一，学界缺乏的是震撼力的成果（多是"承乏"之作），流露的往往是做作 …
苹果雪梨哈密瓜和橙子_新浪博客 ... 团购 group buying 最低生活保障 subsistence allowance 总体规划 overall plan.
会计词汇E ... subsidy code 补贴守则 subsistence allowance 生活津贴；膳食津贴；膳 substandard loan 次级贷款.
汉英口译分类词汇 -... ... （防沙林 sand breaks [温饱型农业 subsistence agriculture （分贝 db;decibel.
宅 - 搜搜百科 ... 2. 宅第[ house; domicile; dwelling; mansion; residence] 3. 宅基[ subsistence homestead] 5. 宅舍[ house].

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'continue to exist'): from Latin subsistere 'stand firm', from sub- 'from below' + sistere 'set, stand'

entry.def: If people subsist, they are just able to obtain the food or money that they need in order to stay alive.

example.ex: The prisoners subsisted on one mug of the worst quality porridge three times a day...
example.tran: 犯人们每日三餐靠一碗稀粥度日。

example.ex: Almost every employee must moonlight in second jobs simply to subsist.
example.tran: 只是为了维持生计，几乎每个职员都要偷偷地做兼职。

sentences.sentence: "he could barely exist on such a low wage"
"Can you live on $2000 a month in New York City?"
"Many people in the world have to subsist on $1 a day"

auth_sentence.content: The villagers would subsist; the weaker ones would die.
auth_sentence.res_content: The villagers would subsist; the weaker ones would die.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The villagers would subsist; the weaker ones would die.

auth_sentence.content: Indian families to subsist for one month There are many more things.
auth_sentence.res_content: Indian families to subsist for one month There are many more things.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Indian families to subsist for one month There are many more things.

auth_sentence.content: In this model of the world the Haitian economy is a mess because people have found a way to subsist with minimal effort.
auth_sentence.res_content: In this model of the world the Haitian economy is a mess because people have found a way to subsist with minimal effort.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In this model of the world the Haitian economy is a mess because people have found a way to subsist with minimal effort.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ir不+resistible可抗拒的→adj.不可抗拒的
persist[v.坚持]+ent表形容词→adj.固执的,坚持的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ent表形容词→adj.抵抗的, 有抵抗力的
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ible可..的→adj.可抵抗的
assist[v.帮助]+ant人→n.助手,助教;辅助物
consist[v.[in]在于,存在于;[of]由…组成,由…构成]+ence表名词→n.坚固性,浓度

stems_affixes.value_cn: 存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
stems_affixes.word_buile: exist[v.存在;生存;生活]+ence表名词→n.存在,实在;生存,生活[方式]
insist[v.[on]坚持要求,坚决主张,坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持,强求
persist[v.坚持]+ence表名词→n.坚持, 持续
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ance表名词→n.[to]抵抗,反抗;抵抗力,阻力;电阻
resist[v.反抗,抵抗]+ence表名词→n.抵抗力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 生存, 生活, 留存
stems_affixes.word_buile: subsist[v.生存,存在,供养]+ence表名词→n.生存, 生活, 留存
as加强动作+sist站→站过来→帮助
con共同+sist站立→站到一起→帮助
de加强+sist站立→站着不动→停止
sub下面+sist站立→站下去,活下去

means.word_mean: (靠很少的钱或食物)维持生活,生存下去
